original_text: They will bring a crowd of people to attack you. They will throw stones at you. They will cut you in pieces with their swords.
korean_text: 무리를 데리고 와서 너를 돌로 치며 칼로 찌르며

sentences.original_text: They will bring a crowd of people to attack you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 당신을 공격하기 위해 무리의 사람들을 데려올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will throw stones at you
They will cut you in pieces with their swords
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 칼로 당신을 조각낼 것입니다
